1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-grow-button
1.0.0.description:
"Grow!" is the online platform which helps publishers monetize directly through a button. Publishers can be support financially and their post about their contents can be shared by users.

This plug-in makes it easy to add the Grow! button to wordpress blogs.
